revised_title: Proceedings of the Royal Society's Anniversary Meeting in 1862
tldr: The Annual Meeting for the Election of Fellows at the Royal Society took place in 1862. Several notable gentlemen were elected into the Society, including George Bentham, Henry William Bristow, Alexander Ross Clarke, and others. The meeting aimed to advance the scientific community and promote British science.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
